title: Saudi Arabia : mobile phone internet users 2017 to 2023
yAxis: Number of mobile phone internet users in millions
summary: The statistic shows the Number of mobile internet users in Saudi Arabia from 2017 to 2023 .
In 2017 , 19.6 millions people accessed the internet through their mobile phone .
In 2023 , this figure is projected to amount 22.5 millions mobile phone internet users .
gold: The statistic shows the number of mobile internet users in Saudi Arabia from 2017 to 2023.
In 2018 , 20.2 million people accessed the internet through their mobile phone.
In 2023 , this figure is projected to amount to 22.5 million mobile phone internet users .
